original_text: So Hilkiah and the other men that the king had sent went to speak to Huldah. Huldah was a prophetess who lived in the north part of Jerusalem. She was the wife of Shallum, the son of Tokhath. Tokhath was the son of Hasrah, who took care of the king's clothes. The king's men told Huldah why they had come to meet her.
korean_text: 이에 힐기야와 왕이 보낸 사람들이 여선지자 훌다에게로 나아가니 그는 하스라의 손자 독핫의 아들로서 예복을 관리하는 살룸의 아내라 예루살렘 둘째 구역에 살았더라 그들이 그에게 이 뜻을 전하매

sentences.original_text: So Hilkiah and the other men went to speak to Huldah
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 힐기야와 다른 사람들이 훌다에게 말하러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: who lived in the north part of Jerusalem
She was the wife of Shallum
Tokhath was the son of Hasrah
who took care of the king's clothes
why they had come to meet her
